text:
Greetings. Today is my last work day as network manager, IT coordinator and
general tech person at Virginia Highlands Community College where I have spent
the past 40 years. I will officially retire on December 31 and am looking
forward to other adventures. I've been a member of the ntsysadmin list longer
that I can think about (my oldest saved email, a joke, from that list is dated
2006) and the patch management list for several years also. I wanted to take a
second to express a heart felt THANK YOU to all that participate in both of
these most helpful lists. You have been an invaluable part of making my career
in IT a success. Thank you for sharing your knowledge, advice and most of all,
your time. I can't imagine being able to do half of what I did without this
great resource. Merry Christmas to those of you that choose to celebrate this
and best wishes to everyone. May patch Tuesdays be calm and all your systems run
smoothly over the coming years. Take care and so long. Glen. -- You received
this message because you are subscribed to the Google Groups "PatchManagement"
group. To unsubscribe from this group and stop receiving emails from it, send an
email to . To view this discussion
on the web visit
https://can01.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fgroups.google.com%2Fd%2Fmsgid%2Fpatchmanagement%2F25a5227b-978d-4b31-ad89-d1a107829cb8%2540email.vccs.edu&data=05%7C02%7Cemail_ingestion%40bighatgroup.com%7C491f3bf073624be5cb0e08dc018b0ef2%7C5a01497e1bcb4711b6e6d24f4ab00393%7C0%7C0%7C638386943959212696%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C3000%7C%7C%7C&sdata=LgwI0jAsz32y8MKGdOutx1bL5ZczXv9Yc6WED9KpTvM%3D&reserved=0.
Link: None
